title: Protected
description: Liam A first date isn’t supposed to last this long. Even though it started out perfect,  there is a nightmare waiting when I bring Whitney back to my house.Now we’re on the run. If I don’t pay mysterious loan sharks $25k, they’ll stop at nothing to get their money back. Two can play at that game.Nothing and no one will stop me from protecting Whitney and rescuing us from this chaos.  Protected is a stand-alone romantic suspense.While there is flirty banter, hot chemistry & passionate kisses, this is a closed door romance.
author: Leigh Skarin
